message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $10,000. I think it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Can you consider that?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your budget, but the product's value is quite high for me. Could we meet in the middle at $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Could we try $8,200? That's the highest I can go.
